name: Jisatsu
description:
Puzzle platformer made for Mini Jam 72.

You're bored of your work life, but you can't simply quit. Luckily, you can daydream creative ways of dying while you're working, right?

Level editor included, you can save your levels as text and submit your creations in the comments. (and others can load them) \ ^ . ^ / 

20 levels total and 1 secret level.
Arrow keys to move. R to restart.

If you can't move, refresh the page.
